column5: Am I the only one having problems connecting here today ?  More time then not I can't connect or should I say navigate on OFC today.   Bob
Nope, had a few problems lately. all other sites I go to seem to be OK.
were on top of it hope to have it straightened out soon.    Art
SUCKS...hahaahahhahha, I've had some problems you'll get worked out....still lke the site
Yes, we've been experiencing problems recently. Please be patient. We're really doing the best we can.
"PLEASE bear with us" is my favorite saying... From Seinfeld when George wanted his car from the parking lot that Kramer set him up with on the cheap....LOL...
and we are glad you are too.
oh yeah  I always start these threads but I thought I would see if anyone else would nut up  yup
Well, you got the Top Nut to step up to the plate....
Yeah happened to me today a few times. Its not the first time either. Happens at least 2 times a week.
I'm still getting my moneys worth Roy... don't you worry at all !
i seem to be ok no problems now
And due to the fact that i was having trouble getting on, so is my Boss

I typed out a really nice message saying how much I loved this site and how wonderful all the mods were, went to send it and boom gone!  Now you'll just have to settle for the short version. I just want to say this is; what the heck, you'll just have to figure it out for yourself!
I've been getting "Page Expired" all day today
amazing how addicted we have become Once the initial panic wears off, take a few deep breaths and know that it is a temporary problem and our leaders are taking care of it.
